description: This file defines a Flutter widget 'VratPage' with its internal state '_VratPageState'. It manages display and interaction with a list of 'vrats' (fasting practices), including toggling selection and tracking a 'streak'. It references a mock repository and data models, and constructs a UI with cards, list tiles, switches, and icons.

classes.name: VratPage
classes.description: A stateful widget representing a page for managing vrats and viewing streaks.

classes.name: _VratPageState
classes.description: The mutable state associated with VratPage, handling data fetching, selection logic, and UI build.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes the state, loads all vrats from the repository, and copies selected vrats into local state.

methods.name: _toggle
methods.description: Handles toggling the selection status of a vrat by its id, updating both local state and repository.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree, displaying the streak card and a list of vrats with toggle switches.

methods.name: _streakCard
methods.description: Creates a card widget that displays the current streak of vrats.
